Package cmput.app.catch_me_if_you_scan

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput.app.catch_me_if_you_scan.UserController
  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller for the User, it communicates to the database in the CRUD format

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getUserByName

        public User getUserByName​(java.lang.String namePassed)
        gets the user info from database using the name given by them
        Parameters:
        namePassed - the name to be searched
        Returns:
        null if name doesn't exist, object if name exists

                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> attributes)
        Updates a user's attributes in the db
        Parameters:
        docID - doc id of the user to update
        attributes - map of the fields to be updated (as Strings) and the values to update to
        Returns:
        boolean value corresponding with the success of the update

      • deleteUser

        Parameters:
